articles.title: America's Cup: New York Yacht Club submits Challenge and evolutionary Draft Protocol - Sail World
articles.description: New York Yacht Club has submitted a Challenge and Evolutionary Draft Protocol for 37th America's Cup, which would see the Cup Match take place in New Zealand during early 2024, utilizing the AC75 class
articles.content:
by New York Yacht Club 8 May 20:44 EST
 9 May 2021On Thursday, May 6, the New York Yacht Club submitted to the Royal New Zealand Yacht Squadron in Auckland, New Zealand, a challenge for the 37th Ame… [+4085 chars]

articles.title: Vaccine deserts: Some countries have no Covid-19 jabs at all - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: In Africa, in the Americas - and even in the Pacific - countries have no Covid-19 vaccines. And that's an issue for the whole world.
articles.content:
At the small hospital where Dr. Oumaima Djarma works in Chad's capital, N'Djamena, there are no debates over which coronavirus vaccine is the best.
 There are simply no vaccines at all.
 Not even f… [+6977 chars]

articles.author: by  Wasilat Azeez
articles.title: Partnership with Microsoft will help preserve local languages, says FG - TheCable
articles.description: The federal government says it engaged Microsoft, an American multinational technology company, to help use machine learning and artificial intelligence in preserving local languages.
articles.content:
